rows.label: campfev11_670_150_msg0001
rows.name: So, Knight of Iira, what's the plan?

rows.label: campfev11_670_150_msg0003
rows.name: Ah... now I really get how Adel feels.

rows.label: campfev11_670_150_msg0006
rows.name:
Our first priority is to put
the people of Iira at ease.

rows.label: campfev11_670_150_msg0007
rows.name:
With the capital attacked, Iira
is now on the brink of collapse.

rows.label: campfev11_670_150_msg0008
rows.name:
Relieving the people's
great anxiety should be
prioritized above all else.

rows.label: campfev11_670_150_msg0010
rows.name:
And I think doing that will
make us stronger, too.

rows.label: campfev11_670_150_msg0011
rows.name:
Then let's check on things
in the capital and at the
resistance camp for a bit.

rows.label: campfev11_670_150_msg0012
rows.name:
I'm counting on you, Minochi,
even if we end up getting
into some nasty business.

rows.label: campfev11_670_150_msg0013
rows.name: Just try not to overdo it...
